typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	pNomeArquivo as string
}
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		Prop_1 as string,
		Prop_2 as string,
		Prop_3 as string,
		Prop_4 as string,
		Prop_5 as string,
		Prop_6 as string,
		Prop_7 as string,
		Prop_8 as string,
		Prop_9 as string,
		Prop_10 as string,
		Prop_11 as string,
		Prop_12 as string,
		Prop_13 as string,
		Prop_14 as string,
		Prop_15 as string,
		Prop_16 as string,
		Prop_17 as string,
		Prop_18 as string,
		Prop_19 as string,
		Prop_20 as string,
		Prop_21 as string,
		Prop_22 as string,
		Prop_23 as string,
		Prop_24 as string,
		Prop_25 as string,
		Prop_26 as string,
		Prop_27 as string,
		Prop_28 as string,
		Prop_29 as string,
		Prop_30 as string,
		Prop_31 as string,
		Prop_32 as string,
		Prop_33 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['vivonext/validados_a_processar','vivonext/processados'],
	preferredFractionalType: 'decimal') ~> srcArqVivoNextK16
source(output(
		ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO as decimal(28,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO WHERE NM_ARQUIVO = '{$pNomeArquivo}'"),
	format: 'query') ~> BuscaLoteArqAtual
BuscaLoteArqAtual derive(SyntheticKey = 1) ~> FakeKey2
SelecaoColunas derive(SyntheticKey = 1,
		VALOR_ORIG_NFST = toDecimal(replace(toString(VALOR_ORIG_NFST), ',' , '.')),
		VALOR_CONTEST_AJUSTE_CANC = toDecimal(replace(toString(VALOR_CONTEST_AJUSTE_CANC), ',' , '.')),
		VALOR_ALOCADO = toDecimal(replace(toString(VALOR_ALOCADO), ',' , '.')),
		VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL = toDecimal(replace(toString(VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL), ',' , '.')),
		VALOR_FATURA = toDecimal(replace(toString(VALOR_FATURA), ',' , '.')),
		SALDO_DEVEDOR = toDecimal(replace(toString(SALDO_DEVEDOR), ',' , '.')),
		DATA_EMISSAO_NFST = toTimestamp(DATA_EMISSAO_NFST, 'yyyyMMdd'),
		DATA_AJUSTE = toTimestamp(DATA_AJUSTE, 'yyyyMMdd'),
		DATA_ALOCACAO = toTimestamp(DATA_AJUSTE, 'yyyyMMdd'),
		DATA_EMISSAO_FATURA_ORIG = toTimestamp(DATA_EMISSAO_FATURA_ORIG, 'yyyyMMdd'),
		DATA_EMISSAO_FATURA = toTimestamp(DATA_EMISSAO_FATURA, 'yyyyMMdd')) ~> FakeKey1
FakeKey1, FakeKey2 join(FakeKey1@SyntheticKey == FakeKey2@SyntheticKey,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join
srcArqVivoNextK16 select(mapColumn(
		CLIENTE_ID = Prop_0,
		NOTA_FISCAL = Prop_1,
		DATA_EMISSAO_NFST = Prop_2,
		VALOR_ORIG_NFST = Prop_3,
		SERIE = Prop_4,
		UF = Prop_5,
		CONTA_CLIENTE = Prop_6,
		CNPJ_CPF = Prop_7,
		NOME_CLIENTE = Prop_8,
		TERMINAL = Prop_9,
		VALOR_CONTEST_AJUSTE_CANC = Prop_10,
		DATA_AJUSTE = Prop_11,
		HORA_AJUSTE = Prop_12,
		VALOR_ALOCADO = Prop_13,
		DATA_ALOCACAO = Prop_14,
		HORA_ALOCACAO = Prop_15,
		OPERADORA = Prop_16,
		CODIGO_OPERADORA = Prop_17,
		CODIGO_MOTIVO_AJUSTE = Prop_18,
		DESCRITIVO_MOTIVO_AJUSTE = Prop_19,
		CREDIT_ID = Prop_20,
		CONTA_CONTABIL = Prop_21,
		DESCR_CONTA_CONTABIL = Prop_22,
		NUMERO_FATURA = Prop_23,
		VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL = Prop_24,
		DATA_EMISSAO_FATURA_ORIG = Prop_25,
		FATU_ALOCADA = Prop_26,
		DATA_EMISSAO_FATURA = Prop_27,
		MESANOFATURA = Prop_28,
		VALOR_FATURA = Prop_29,
		SALDO_DEVEDOR = Prop_30,
		DEBIT_ID = Prop_31,
		COD_TIPO_RECEBIVEIS = Prop_32,
		DESCR_TIPO_RECEBIVEIS = Prop_33
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelecaoColunas
Join sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID_VIVO_NEXT_K16 as decimal(28,0),
		ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO as decimal(28,0),
		CLIENTE_ID as string,
		NOTA_FISCAL as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_NFST as timestamp,
		VL_ORIG_NFST as decimal(15,2),
		SERIE as string,
		CONTA_CLIENTE as string,
		CNPJ_CPF as string,
		NOME_CLIENTE as string,
		TERMINAL as string,
		VL_CONTEST_AJUSTE as decimal(15,2),
		VL_ALOCADO as decimal(15,2),
		DT_ALOCACAO as timestamp,
		HR_ALOCACAO as string,
		DT_AJUSTE as timestamp,
		HR_AJUSTE as string,
		OPERADORA as string,
		CD_OPERADORA as string,
		CD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE as string,
		DS_MOTIVO_AJUSTE as string,
		NUMERO_FATURA as string,
		FATU_ALOCADA as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA as timestamp,
		MESANOFATURA as string,
		VL_DOCTO_ORIGINAL as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_DEVEDOR as decimal(15,2),
		CONTA_CONTABIL as string,
		DS_CONTA_CONTABIL as string,
		VL_FATURA as decimal(15,2),
		CD_TIPO_RECEBIVEIS as string,
		DS_TIPO_RECEBIVEIS as string,
		DEBIT_ID as string,
		CREDIT_ID as string,
		UF as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO,
		CLIENTE_ID,
		NOTA_FISCAL,
		DT_EMISSAO_NFST = DATA_EMISSAO_NFST,
		VL_ORIG_NFST = VALOR_ORIG_NFST,
		SERIE,
		CONTA_CLIENTE,
		CNPJ_CPF,
		NOME_CLIENTE,
		TERMINAL,
		VL_CONTEST_AJUSTE = VALOR_CONTEST_AJUSTE_CANC,
		VL_ALOCADO = VALOR_ALOCADO,
		DT_ALOCACAO = DATA_ALOCACAO,
		HR_ALOCACAO = HORA_ALOCACAO,
		DT_AJUSTE = DATA_AJUSTE,
		HR_AJUSTE = HORA_AJUSTE,
		OPERADORA,
		CD_OPERADORA = CODIGO_OPERADORA,
		CD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE = CODIGO_MOTIVO_AJUSTE,
		DS_MOTIVO_AJUSTE = DESCRITIVO_MOTIVO_AJUSTE,
		NUMERO_FATURA,
		FATU_ALOCADA,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA = DATA_EMISSAO_FATURA,
		MESANOFATURA,
		VL_DOCTO_ORIGINAL = VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL,
		SALDO_DEVEDOR,
		CONTA_CONTABIL,
		DS_CONTA_CONTABIL = DESCR_CONTA_CONTABIL,
		VL_FATURA = VALOR_FATURA,
		CD_TIPO_RECEBIVEIS = COD_TIPO_RECEBIVEIS,
		DS_TIPO_RECEBIVEIS = DESCR_TIPO_RECEBIVEIS,
		DEBIT_ID,
		CREDIT_ID,
		UF
	)) ~> GravaTabVivoNextK16
